I either wrote or maintain the following pieces of software. More info can be found on my Github account.

Original Author

  • gazette — Ruby library for the Instapaper API.
  • exodus — Dead simple, language agnostic migrations framework written in Python.
  • rspec-encoding-matchers — RSpec matchers for ruby 1.9 string encoding.

Maintainer

  • http_status_exceptions — A Rails plugin to use exceptions for generating HTTP status responses.
